Blog.post: so how many random ppl on the internet like NFL (American Football) .. well I for one do, and my facourite team is urlLink Oakland Raiders , who cares about u ppl :P.. go there or i will kill u. So that is it for me, ohh i got a new phone like the other week, it's a SAMSUNG!, new model SGH X430, i like it .. if you want to know the specs, go search for it yourself :P. I also recommend this site for West Australian's, its about this really hot chick .. thats incentive enough right? click urlLink here . well im off time for me to sleep good night .. to whoever stumbles upon this blog

hehhe, welcome to my blog, where i can abuse anyone and anthing without so much of a complaint, apart from that .. i dont think anyone ever will read this .. so i will just use this account to post on other ppl's account :D so long!

how come the most interesting stuff happens in RE? .. wtf .. oh well .. anyway personality test .. some random test teacher gave us to do today .. i am a ISJF - meaning Introvert, Senser, Judge and Feeler .. what are you guys? the site is here to urlLink click .. and on another note, i learnt how to parallel park, reverse from driveway (shutup) .. and yeah . that is about it .. go the CR-V manual .. damn clutch >.

while watching Uprising on Channel 9 the other day .. i was confronted with a very good quote "how can a moral man with moral values live in a immoral world?" .. and i pondered .. yes i pondered on this very quote .. after seeing the man burn himself to death protecting his family and friends .. and today i confronted the same question also .. it happened in Religion .. we were given excercises to do .. and my groups question was something like this: Pia and Sally are best of friends, Pia and her husband have just found out that they could not conceive a child, in that Pia was infertile .. now .. Sally herself is happily married with 3 children, a loving husband and in good shape .. Pia out of no where asks Sally to be a surrogate mother .. Sally knowing that this could bring joy to Pia and her husband .. is confronted with a dilemma.. My own morals and stuff .. say that Sally should say no .. i mean we have seen cases where the surrogate mother becomes attached to the unborn child, as well as the fact that the surrogate mother could also have feelings for her best friends' husband .. i mean there are many dilemma's .. so to save much hurt and pain .. the best option would be no.. right? .. what are your thoughts? Im feeling a bit moralistic today so please share

*sigh* i got my exam results back .. not a pretty site at all .. i can tell you now i'll be averaging about a 64% with those marks .. and that is without scaling .. i was in a pretty shitty mood at school today .. time to be serious in what i want to do with my life now .. with that said .. i would have to aim for a 68% and above to get into Psychology (TER 88) .. so yeah .. god i feel like i want to vomit :( .. oh well gotta study talks to you all later's .. time to up the averages .. hopefully

yes free at last, no more stupid exams to get in the way for the next 4 days .. i am a happy camper .. speaking of which i should go play some games ... hmmm call of duty, talk to you all later time to kick some axis arse.

welcome one and all to my site .. well .. blog to be more precise, i am a 17yr old west australian, who likes urlLink AFL and urlLink NFL .. two entirely different games. Well anyway .. yes, you can all post your lame arse comments to me WITHOUT having to be a member. w00t. anyway on a closing note, i would like to direct you all to this site urlLink http://football-freaks.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=3087 and tell me what you think about it.
TEE time tables are up urlLink click here . Nuff said im in distress .. denial whatever you call it .. havent posted in ages .. so here, done. peace

Arguably one of the best running backs to every set his foot on a Football field has announced his retirement. Ricky Williams has told his team today (25th July 2004) that he will retire before the season commences urlLink (click here for interview) . This is a devasting blow to the Miami Dolphins, Ricky Williams was there spine, and without him the same fate might fall upon them as it did Oakland Raiders in 2003 (4 - 12). 3 Years ago Ricky Williams was diagnosed with social anxiety disorder, and also came 'out of the closet' in that year about his ordeal as well, if you have ever seen him in an interview after a game, he would always wear his vizor/helmet on, this was due to his disorder. All i can say is at least he ended it on his own terms, he gave it his all and when he couldnt he retired for the team.

Ok, long time since i posted .. anyway .. i will be posting the Yahoo Football Fantasy draft picks for year 2004. Order is as follows :: Danny, Ian, Jonny, Li, Will to read what picks and stuff we will use the official format a.b (meaning round A, pick B) .. im gonna only say the top picks of each team, and starting positions as of 20th July 2004 on their list. Danny's team 1.01 Michael Vick (Atlanta Falcons) - QB (Overall Pick) QB : M Vick(ATL), T Green(KC), C Pennington(NYJ) WR : T Holt(St.L), A Boldin (ARI), A Toomer(NYG), S Smith(CAR) RB : J Lewis(BAL), S Davis(CAR), C Dillon(NE) TE : M Pollard(IND), I Milli(SEA) Ian's team 1.02 LaDanian Tomlinson (San Diego Chargers) - RB (Second Overall Pick) QB : T Brady(NE), Q Carter(DAL), R Gannon(OAK) WR : M Harrison(IND), S Moss(NYJ), D Jackson(SEA), J Porter(OAK) RB: L Tomlinson(SD), C Portis(WAS), R Willaims(MIA) TE: R McMichael(MIA), F Jones(ARI) Jonny's team 1.03 Peyton Manning(Indianapolis Colts) - QB (Third Overall Pick) QB : P Manning(IND), D McNabb(PHI), C Palmer(CIN) WR : R Moss(PHI), C Johnson(CIN), L Coles(WAS), C Chambers(MIA) RB: M Faulk(St.L), R Johnson(CIN), D Davis(HOU) TE: K Winslow(CLE), J Kleinsasser(MIN) Li's team 1.04 Brett Favre(Green Bay Packers) - QB (Fourth Pick) team yet to be announced William's team 1.05 Daunte Culpepper (Minnesota Vikings) - QB (Fifth Pick) QB : D Culpepper(MIN), S McNair(TEN), M Bulger(St.L) WR : J Horn(NE), D Mason(TEN), E Moulds(BUF), J Smith(JACK) RB: A Green(GB), D McAllister(NO), S Alexander(SEA) TE: J Shockey(NYG), A Crumpler(ATL) ok after 30 odd minutes of eye hurting .. and making me feel vomity .. this is it .. what the teams are posted as .. peace.

"You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, and the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese. The Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named 'Bush', 'Dick' and 'Colon.' Need I say more?" -Chris Rock hehhehe thought i would share it with u ppl :D

just an early reminder that urlLink american football Australian style :P will be held again this Saturday the 10th of July 2004 at Britannia Oval in Leederville at 1pm, remember to bring ur water bottle, towel, stuff .. all that is necessary .. weather should be good .. or so i am told, and game should finish at around 5pm, all who are interested are welcome to join.

Well today i opened up the Sunday Times, and lo behold i find a section called STM, and who should be on the cover .. none other then Keira Knightley (the new KK), she is to rival urlLink dan's KK (Kristen Kreuk) .. or so i think, the hottest 19 year old to be exported out of Britain. Well good for her, it is time she was taken into the limelight to be recognised by all of hollywood, the stunt actions she does are to die for, or so i am told, this had reignited my desire to watch King Arthur, all that are interested please email me at raidersboi@gmail.com. if you are interested in coming to watch it with me. Here are some interesting links of KK urlLink kkwavefront.com urlLink www.keiraknightleypalace.com/ tell me what you think of her.

well in keeping with tradition i would like you all to direct your attention to my friend Matt's blog site right urlLink here .. well now that is over and done, i might make some changes to this blog site and keep you updated .. on other news, i have been entered into the Titration Stakes chemistry competition .. considering im a sucky sucky chemistry student this is quite surprising .. i was SUPPOSE to be an emergency .. but NOOOOOOOOOO urlLink Lydia had to butt in and say i wanted to do Titrations .. so now me and urlLink Danny have to enter the competition .. or die.

this can be taken into any context : life, love whatever .. anyway, the way im feeling right now is that ive just thrown a boomerang waiting for it to come back .. knowing full well it will never come back. NEVER. nuff said. peace ian

As some of you might know, my Grandmother passed away on Friday the 30th of August 2004. In rememberance of her, i found these poem very comforting and would like to share it with you, although i dont like anyone to really know this piece of information, ill share with you these two poems. The parting came so suddenly, We'll always wonder why. The hardest part of all was We never said goodbye. ------------------------------ God closed your eyes to ease the pain, To wish you back would be in cain. You suffered so much, you told so few. You did not deserve what you went through. Tired and weary, you made no fuss, But tried to hard to stay with ys. Peace everyone, till next time i post.
